products.name: Bench
products.description: ISO 5 compliant electropolished 304 stainless steel gowning bench with perforated top. Designed for maximum airflow and minimal particle retention in critical gowning areas.
products.introduction: Engineered for sterile environments, this Heavy-Duty Cleanroom Gowning Bench combines ergonomic design with rigorous contamination control. Constructed from heavy-gauge Type 304 stainless steel with an electropolished finish, it resists corrosion and harsh sterilants. The perforated top surface allows for 35% laminar airflow pass-through, eliminating turbulence and dead zones where particles accumulate. Essential for personnel gowning protocols in pharmaceutical, biotech, and semiconductor facilities.
features: Perforated top for laminar flow compatibility (35% open area)
Rounded 'bullnose' edges to prevent glove snagging
Continuous seam welds, ground smooth for easy sanitization
Adjustable non-marking leveling feet for stability

products.name: Mobile Storage Bin
products.description: Mobile stainless steel bulk storage bin with hinged lid. Ideal for transporting and storing bulk ingredients or waste in cleanroom areas.
products.introduction: Versatile mobile storage for bulk materials. This Mobile Storage Bin features a heavy-duty stainless steel chassis with a hinged lid, protecting contents from contamination during transport. Its smooth, seamless interior ensures standard-compliant cleaning, while the robust casters allow for easy maneuvering of heavy loads. Perfect for moving raw materials, waste, or laundry through classified zones.
features: Hinged stainless steel lid with handle
Seamless interior construction for easy cleaning

products.name: Equipment Chassis Cart
products.description: Specialized cantilevered chassis cart for transporting heavy equipment. Open design allows for easy loading of production machinery.
products.introduction: A tailored solution for machinery mobility. This Equipment Chassis Cart features a unique cantilevered frame designed to interface with specific production equipment or tanks. The angled handle structure allows operators to maneuver heavy loads while maintaining visibility. Its low center of gravity and high-capacity wheels ensure stable transport of valuable assets.

products.name: Cleaner Cart
products.description: Modular stainless steel janitorial cart designed for cleanroom mopping systems. Organizes buckets, wringers, and waste without harboring contaminants.
products.introduction: Elevate your facility's sanitation protocol with our Modular Cleaner Cart. Specifically built to accommodate cleanroom-specific bucket systems and wringers, it keeps cleaning tools organized and off the floor. The open-wire or tubular frame design minimizes surface area for particle accumulation, while the electropolished finish withstands daily exposure to aggressive phenolic and quaternary disinfectants.
features: Integrated holders for mop handles and wringers
Waste bag retention ring with lid

products.name: Convey Window
products.description: Static pass-through with mechanical interlock. Double-wall stainless steel construction prevents cross-contamination between classified zones.
products.introduction: Control contamination at the source. Our Convey Window (Static Pass Box) serves as a barrier between zones of different cleanliness levels. The robust Mechanical Interlock System ensures that one door remains locked while the other is open, preventing direct air exchange. The interior chamber features coved corners (rounded radius) to eliminate particle traps and allow for thorough disinfection.
features: Seamless, coved internal chamber for easy cleaning

products.name: PC Enclosure
products.description: Flush-mount stainless steel computer enclosure with keyboard tray. Protects IT hardware in wash-down and sterile environments.
products.introduction: Integrate digital workflows without compromising cleanliness. This Flush-Mount PC Enclosure is designed to house standard monitors and keyboards within the cleanroom wall, eliminating horizontal surfaces that collect dust. The sealed unit features a hinged glass door for monitor access and a fold-down or integrated keyboard station, all constructed from corrosion-resistant 304 stainless steel.
features: Flush-mount design for seamless wall integration
Resistant to biological and chemical agents

products.name: Multi-Tier Wire Cart
products.description: High-capacity multi-tier wire cart with deep baskets. Perfect for batch transport of small components or sterile packs.
products.introduction: Maximize transport efficiency for small items. This Multi-Tier Wire Cart features 3 generous wire basket shelves, providing ample volume for loose items like shoe covers, wipers, or small vials. The wire construction ensures full visibility and airflow, while the raised basket edges prevent items from falling during transit. Includes a full-width handle for easy steerability.

products.name: Electric Workbench
products.description: Ergonomic height-adjustable workbench with ESD top. Electric actuators assist sit/stand operations for improved operator productivity.
products.introduction: Combine operator wellness with process precision. The Electric Height-Adjustable Workbench allows operators to seamlessly transition between sitting and standing, reducing fatigue during long shifts. Powered by smooth, quiet electric lifters sealed within the legs to prevent particle generation. The work surface is available in ESD laminate or perforated stainless steel for critical electronics assembly.
features: Integrated electrical raceway with cleanroom-safe outlets
Sealed lifting columns for ISO 5 compliance

material.value: 304 Stainless Steel Frame / ESD Laminate Top

products.name: Fridge Cart
products.description: Heavy-duty chassis cart designed to mobilize under-counter lab refrigerators. Features side ventilation slots for compressor airflow.
products.introduction: Transform stationary equipment into mobile assets. Specifically engineered to support heavy laboratory refrigerators, freezers, and incubators, this Fridge Cart enables easy equipment relocation for cleaning or reconfiguration. The reinforced chassis creates a rigid platform, while precision laser-cut ventilation patterns on the side panels ensure the appliance's compressor receives adequate airflow to prevent overheating.
features: Reinforced 12-gauge chassis for heavy loads (up to 500 lbs)
Laser-cut side ventilation for compressor cooling
Swivel-lock heavy-duty casters for precise positioning
Low-profile design minimizes working height increase
Custom sizing to fit specific appliance models

products.name: Wire Basket Trolley
products.description: Deep wire basket trolley for transporting bulk items, garments, or sterile packages. Large volume with excellent visibility and airflow.
products.introduction: Efficient bulk transport with maximum visibility. This Wire Basket Trolley features a deep, high-volume basket design constructed from stainless steel wire grid. It allows for full air circulation around contents, making it ideal for laundry, shoe covers, or packaged sterile goods. The lightweight yet durable frame ensures easy maneuverability through busy corridors.
features: Deep basket design for maximum volume

products.name: 3-Tier Perforated Trolley
products.description: Three-tier stainless steel trolley with perforated shelves. Combines flat-surface utility with vertical airflow permeability.
products.introduction: The perfect balance of stability and airflow. This 3-Tier Trolley features perforated flat shelves which offer the stable support of a solid surface for transport of small beakers or vials, while the perforation pattern allows for 30% vertical airflow pass-through. Ideal for laminar flow zones where air disruption must be minimized.
features: Perforated shelves for laminar flow compatibility
Flat surface stability for small items
Raised lips on shelves to prevent rolling

products.name: Locker
products.description: Sloped-top stainless steel garment locker with separated compartments. vented for airflow and odor control in gowning rooms.
products.introduction: Secure, organized, and compliant personnel storage. These Stainless Steel Lockers feature a dramatically sloped top to ensure dust falls to the floor rather than accumulating overhead. The interior is divided to separate street clothes from cleanroom garments, preventing cross-contamination. Louvered vents ensure proper air circulation to keep garments fresh.
features: Steep sloped top (1:3 pitch) prevents dust build-up
Dedicated compartments for shoes and garments
Recessed handles with padlock hasps or digital locks

products.name: Mixer
products.description: Sanitary 316L stainless steel mixing vessel with CIP capability. High-shear impeller for homogeneous mixing of pharma formulations.
products.introduction: Precision mixing for sanitary applications. This Pharmaceutical-Grade Mixer is crafted from 316L stainless steel with a mirror-finish internal surface (Ra < 0.4μm) to prevent residue adherence. Equipped with a variable-speed high-shear impeller, it ensures rapid and homogenous blending of liquids and powders. The vessel is designed for full Clean-In-Place (CIP) compatibility.
features: Variable frequency drive (VFD) for speed control

products.name: Nitrogen Cabinet
products.description: Smart nitrogen-purge desiccator cabinet. Maintains ultra-low humidity (<5% RH) for oxidation-free storage of sensitive wafers and optics.
products.introduction: Ultimate protection for moisture-sensitive components. Our Smart Nitrogen Cabinet creates a clean, dry, and inert environment to prevent oxidation and moisture defects. The automated purge system creates positive pressure with nitrogen gas, efficiently displacing moisture. Ideal for storing semiconductor wafers, ICs, and precision optics.
features: Static-Dissipative PVC or Stainless Steel construction
Plenum chamber for uniform gas distribution
Reinforced doors with airtight elastomeric seals

products.name: Scaffold
products.description: Collapsible all-stainless steel cleanroom scaffold. Provides safe elevated access for HEPA filter changes and facility maintenance.
products.introduction: Reach new heights safely and cleanly. This specially designed Cleanroom Scaffold eliminates the particle shedding associated with aluminum ladders. Constructed entirely from electropolished stainless steel, it features non-slip punched treads and a folding design for compact storage. The safety cage and guardrails ensure OSHA compliance for overhead work.
features: Collapsible design for easy storage and transport

products.name: Sink
products.description: Hands-free electropolished sink station. Deep basin and high backsplash design prevents splash contamination. Pedal or sensor activated.
products.introduction: Touch-free hygiene for critical areas. Our Stainless Steel Sink Station is designed to minimize cross-contamination risks. The deep-drawn basin and high integral backsplash contain water within the unit. Activated by knee-pedals or infrared sensors, it allows users to wash without touching faucet handles. The electropolished finish ensures the basin remains biofilm-free.

products.name: Small Pillar
products.description: Stainless steel impact protection bollard. Protects facility corners, door frames, and equipment from cart collisions.
products.introduction: The silent guardian of your cleanroom infrastructure. These Stainless Steel Pillars (Bollards) provide robust protection against accidental impacts from carts and trolleys, preventing costly damage to walls and door frames. Designed with a sleek, polished finish and concealed floor mounting, they offer maximum protection with minimal visual intrusion.
features: Rounded top cap so no particles settle

products.name: Storage Rack
products.description: Adjustable 4-tier stainless steel shelving unit. High load capacity and corrosion resistant. Perforated or solid shelf options.
products.introduction: Adaptable, heavy-duty storage for sterile supplies. Our Modular Storage Racks are the backbone of cleanroom inventory management. Constructed from corrosion-resistant 304 stainless steel, they withstand frequent cleaning with harsh chemicals. Shelves are easily adjustable to accommodate varying package sizes, and the open design ensures unrestricted airflow.
features: Choice of Solid or Perforated shelves
Adjustable leveling feet for uneven floors

products.name: Table
products.description: Reinforced stainless steel work table with lower undershelf. Vibration-resistant top suitable for microscopy and general assembly.
products.introduction: Stability creates precision. This Standard Cleanroom Table features a reinforced top with sound-deadening channels to create a rigid, vibration-free surface ideal for inspection and assembly. The lower undershelf adds structural rigidity and convenient storage. The fully welded frame eliminates crevices, ensuring full compliance with sanitation protocols.
features: Top reinforced with U-channels for rigidity

products.name: Tray Trolley
products.description: Multi-tier stainless steel tray trolley. High-density transport solution for baking trays, drying filters, or component trays.
products.introduction: Maximize transport density in minimal footprint. This Multi-Tier Tray Trolley (Ladder Cart) is capable of holding up to 10 standard size trays or pans. Ideal for drying operations, batch transport, or cafeteria service, it utilizes vertical space efficiently. The open design facilitates airflow for cooling or drying applications while keeping trays securely in place.

products.name: Work Platform
products.description: Rolling stainless steel ladder platform with 8 steps and safety handrails. Provides safe elevated access for maintenance and inspection.
products.introduction: Secure access for hard-to-reach areas. This Mobile Cleanroom Work Platform functions as a robust rolling ladder. Featuring 8 non-slip perforated steps and full-height safety handrails, it allows personnel to safely ascend to elevated equipment or facility infrastructure. The spring-loaded casters lock into place when weight is applied, ensuring complete stability during use.
features: 8-step design with large top working platform
Perforated treads used for liquid drainage

products.name: Heavy Duty Workbench
products.description: Robust 2-tier stainless steel industrial workbench. Simple, super-heavy-duty construction for handling massive loads in clean zones.
products.introduction: Uncompromising strength for heavy tasks. This Heavy-Duty 2-Tier Workbench eliminates the bells and whistles to focus on pure structural integrity. Built with oversized tubular framing and a thick-gauge top, it is designed to support heavy equipment or large valve assemblies. The lower shelf offers additional reinforced storage space.
